prompt.role: You are a senior integration engineer responsible for validating that parallel development tasks integrate correctly without conflicts.

task.title: Integration - Level 0
task.description: Validate that Level 0 tasks (1, 3, 4, 6) integrate correctly with no conflicts before proceeding to Level 1.

technical_specifications.spec: Verify all Level 0 tasks build together
Run full test suite to ensure integration
Check for file conflicts or duplicates
Ensure database and code in sync

prompt.implementation_details: Run cargo check, cargo build, cargo test. Verify diesel migrations work. Build frontend with npm. Check for any integration issues. Report conflicts or errors.
prompt.test_strategy: Execute cargo check, cargo build, cargo test, diesel migration run, npm run build. Verify no errors in any command. Check logs for warnings or issues.
prompt.instructions: 1. Verify all Level 0 task files exist 2. Run cargo check and cargo build 3. Execute cargo test 4. Test database migrations 5. Build frontend 6. Report any integration issues or conflicts
